entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Westlock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 8.
